name: High Voltage puzzle
storyline:
About me
My name is Vadim and I have a little hobby - gamemaking, I made a small puzzle game where you can build high voltage line supports and substation equipment. My game is not only enteratintment but it brings some eductaional function (there are techucal information about HV supports and substation equipment). My game is done but there are a lot of thing that I can amke better.

Also you can help:

Disseminate information about the company and the game on social networks.
Send some drawings of eqipment in DWG.
All people who will help me will be place to the the credits menu!
summary: High voltage puzzle is a simple logic game where you can mount power line supports and substation equipment, and see the result on your mobile device. Complete 30 levels with real equipment and feel like an engineer.
